ComicInfo.Title: Robbing Hood, Prance of Thieves; One Afternoon in New York City; Cartoondom Confidential; Cracked's Plan for Converting Weapons for Civilian Use; Bart's Catalogue for Conniving Underachievers; One Fine Day at the Race Track; Spies & Saboteurs Hit the Toons; R-Rated Ads for Family Films; You Know You're Courting Big Trouble When ...; Cracked's Joy of Working; One Day at the Cro-Magnon Inventor's Club; Wrestling Hype for Boring Sports; Roasting Mother Goose; Hackdraft; Winner of the Greatest Shut-Up in Captivity; Other Impact Tests
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 15:33:15. [CVDB293762] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:45:34. [Issue ID 250628]
